name: Permitted Actions Without Identification Or Authentication
description: The organization identifies and documents specific user actions that can be performed on the information system without identification or authentication.\n
supplemental_guidance: The organization allows limited user activity without identification and authentication for public websites or other publicly available information systems (e.g., individuals accessing a federal information system at http://www.firstgov.gov). Related security control: IA-2.\n
enhancements: (1) The organization permits actions to be performed without identification and authentication only to the extent necessary to accomplish mission objectives.\n
